divs: sighting detailsthis account of this event being told by someone that didn't witness this. this is just the information i was told from my brother and his gf. they are just normal everyday people and this event really frightened and was truly amazing. i really wish i could have been in there place for this. this event takes place two years ago. i never ask my brother if i could post this and i haven't talked to him about it in a while so i am a bite fuzzy on some details. my brother, his gf and there roommate were sitting watching television in there apartment. this is at night not too sure at what time but it was dark. they noticed strange lights out side in the sky through their glass door onto there balcony. my brother being a amateur astronomer owns a telescope that sits in front of their glass door of the balcony. he is always star gazing or using it to view the sights of the town. being interested in such astronomical events he went to investigate the strage lights. too his amazement he describes seeing two small crafts flying around the city. he told me they weren't too high in the sky(300m-800m) and were flying around the city scanning the town and area. his gf and roommate were also watching this as it was happening. now my brother told me that they were doing this for quite some time a few hours , this gave him plenty of time to view the small crafts through his telescope. he drew the crafts out on paper the last time i visited him just to describe it better visually. the small crafts diamond shaped with lights orbiting around them. he described the lights as appearing to work like some kind of shield\aura. there movements were that of a fast helicopter\ stunt rc copter but over the town. moved fast and would stop scan the move on. not physically possible to do with his knowledge of aviation's is what he told me. he was viewing them through a telescope so he got one of the best sighting a person could wish for. during this long event he noticed a large crafted in the upper atmosphere.this was disk shaped with many lights and was blocking out stars as it slowly moved across the sky. he never drew the mother ship for me but i had a long talk with him about this event a few years ago. my brothers emotional state through this was fear and amazement. his gf and roommate both were horribly frightened to the point of tears and crying. the most fearful of the event was when they were viewing the smaller crafts through his telescope and the scanning beam washed over them on his balcony. he told me that he ducked and nearly **** his pants , pardon my expression. his gf and roommate wanted him to stop watching in fear of retaliation from the crafts but he continued anyways. he called a few of his friends that came over and also viewed this crafts through his telescope. no video footage or photos were taken from him. he just enjoyed his view from his telescope and said it was a lifetime experience. i was told the event ended when the two smaller ships flew up to the mother ship then took off and he couldn;t find it anymore. his gf was scared during the telling of this story and didn't like talking about it. was told that everyone that watched it had a hard time sleeping and they ended up watching a few movies that night till sun came up. the scanning he described as a thin line that wash over and area, ships would move on then do it again from different angles.
Summary: Watched two small UFOs and mother ship in upper atmoshpere.
